message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you, and I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Alice, $20,000 is way too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but my budget is capped at $12,000.  Would you be willing to come down to that?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  To make this work, I could come down to $17,000.  This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $17,000 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. It's the absolute maximum I can afford.  Let me know if this is something you can work with.
